name: @arcana-ui/core
description: AI-first React design system with token-driven theming. Warm, clean, accessible. Built for machines, beautiful for humans.
quickStart: // Theme switching — no JS runtime, just CSS
themeSetup: Set data-theme='light' or data-theme='dark' on <html> element

tokens.documentation: All tokens are CSS custom properties prefixed with --arcana-
tokens.themeSwitch: Set data-theme attribute on root element: 'light' | 'dark'
tokens.customization: Override any --arcana-* property in your CSS to customize

components.name: Button
components.description: Primary action trigger. Renders as <button>. Use for form submissions, CTAs, confirmations, and navigation actions.
components.when: User needs to trigger an action or navigate
components.accessibility: Renders as <button>. Include text or aria-label. Loading state sets aria-busy.

components.name: Input
components.description: Text input field with label, error, and prefix/suffix slot support. Forwards ref.
components.when: User needs to enter text: name, email, password, search, etc.

error.description: Error message or true to show error styling

prefix.description: Icon or text prepended inside input

suffix.description: Icon or text appended inside input

type.description: HTML input type: text, email, password, search, etc.

components.accessibility: Auto-generates id. Links label with htmlFor. Sets aria-invalid and aria-describedby.

components.name: Textarea
components.description: Multi-line text input with optional auto-resize and character counter.
components.when: User needs to enter longer text: bio, description, message, notes

maxLength.description: Max characters. Shows X/max counter when showCount=true

components.name: Select
components.description: Native-styled dropdown select with label and error support.
components.when: User needs to choose from a list of options

placeholder.description: Disabled first option shown before selection

examples: <Select label="Country" placeholder="Select a country" options={[{value:'us', label:'United States'}, {value:'uk', label:'UK'}]} />

components.name: Checkbox
components.description: Single checkbox with label, description, and indeterminate state.
components.when: User needs to toggle a boolean option or select multiple items from a list

components.name: Radio / RadioGroup
components.description: Single radio or grouped radio buttons with descriptions. RadioGroup is the preferred pattern.
components.when: User must choose exactly one option from a small set

RadioGroup.name.description: HTML name attribute for the radio group

examples: <RadioGroup name="plan" label="Select plan" value={plan} onChange={setPlan} options={[{value:'free', label:'Free'}, {value:'pro', label:'Pro', description:'$9/mo'}]} />

components.name: Toggle
components.description: On/off switch with label. Uses role=switch for accessibility.
components.when: User toggles a feature on or off (settings, preferences)

components.name: Badge
components.description: Small status label for counts, states, or categories.
components.when: Display status, count, or category label inline

components.name: Avatar / AvatarGroup
components.description: User avatar with image, initials fallback, and group stacking.
components.when: Display user identity: profile picture, initials, or group of users

Avatar.src.description: Image URL. Falls back to initials on error.

Avatar.name.description: Full name — used for initials and accessible label

AvatarGroup.max.description: Max avatars to show before +N overflow indicator

components.name: Card / CardHeader / CardBody / CardFooter
components.import: import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter } from '@arcana-ui/core'
components.description: Flexible container for grouping related content. Composed of optional Header, Body, and Footer slots.
components.when: Group related content: dashboard widgets, list items, profile sections, forms

components.name: Modal
components.description: Dialog overlay with focus trap, escape-to-close, and portal rendering.
components.when: Confirm destructive actions, display forms, show detail overlays
examples:
setOpen(false)} title="Delete item" description="This cannot be undone." footer={<>}>

Confirmation content here.
components.accessibility: role=dialog, aria-modal, focus trap, Escape closes, focus restored on close.

components.name: Alert
components.description: Inline status message for info, success, warning, or error states.
components.when: Show form validation results, operation outcomes, or important notices inline
examples: <Alert variant="success" title="Saved!">Your changes have been saved.</Alert>
<Alert variant="error" title="Error" onClose={dismiss}>Failed to save. Try again.</Alert>

components.name: ToastProvider / useToast
components.description: Toast notification system. Wrap app in ToastProvider, then call toast() from useToast hook.
components.when: Show transient success/error/info messages after async operations
examples: toast({ title: 'Error', description: 'Please try again.', variant: 'error' })
toast({ title: 'Deleted', action: { label: 'Undo', onClick: handleUndo } })

components.name: Tabs / TabList / Tab / TabPanels / TabPanel
components.import: import { Tabs, TabList, Tab, TabPanels, TabPanel } from '@arcana-ui/core'
components.description: Accessible tab navigation. Supports controlled/uncontrolled, line and pills variants.
components.when: Organize related content into named sections: settings, details, views

Tab.value.description: Tab identifier, must match TabPanel value

components.name: Accordion / AccordionItem / AccordionTrigger / AccordionContent
components.import: import { Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionTrigger, AccordionContent } from '@arcana-ui/core'
components.description: Collapsible content panels. Supports single or multiple expand modes.
components.when: FAQs, settings sections, collapsible content groups
examples: <Accordion type="single" defaultValue="q1"><AccordionItem value="q1"><AccordionTrigger>What is Arcana?</AccordionTrigger><AccordionContent>An AI-first design system.</AccordionContent></AccordionItem></Accordion>

components.name: Stack
components.description: Vertical flex container with consistent gap spacing using Arcana spacing scale.
components.when: Stack elements vertically with consistent spacing

components.name: HStack
components.description: Horizontal flex container with consistent gap spacing.
components.when: Arrange elements side by side: button groups, form rows, icon+text combos

justify.description: CSS justifyContent. Use 'flex-end' for right-aligned buttons

components.name: Grid
components.description: CSS Grid wrapper with responsive column support.
components.when: Multi-column layouts: card grids, form field rows, dashboard widgets

columns.description: Number of equal columns or CSS grid-template-columns string

gap.description: Spacing token for both row and column gap

examples: <Grid columns={2} gap={4}><Input label="First name" /><Input label="Last name" /></Grid>

components.name: Container
components.description: Centered max-width container with responsive padding.
components.when: Constrain page content width and center it

size.description: Max-width preset: sm=640px, md=768px, lg=1024px, xl=1280px

components.name: Navbar / NavbarBrand / NavbarContent / NavbarActions
components.import: import { Navbar, NavbarBrand, NavbarContent, NavbarActions } from '@arcana-ui/core'
components.description: Responsive navigation header with brand, nav links, and action slots.
components.when: Top-level site navigation

components.name: EmptyState
components.description: Centered empty state with icon, title, description, and optional action.
components.when: No data to display: empty tables, no search results, first-time empty views
examples: <EmptyState icon={<FolderIcon />} title="No files yet" description="Upload your first file to get started." action={<Button>Upload file</Button>} />
<EmptyState size="sm" title="No results" description="Try a different search term." />

components.name: Form / FormField / FormLabel / FormHelperText / FormErrorMessage
components.import: import { Form, FormField, FormLabel, FormHelperText, FormErrorMessage } from '@arcana-ui/core'
components.description: Form wrapper with field-level validation state management via context.
components.when: Building forms with labels, helper text, and validation messages

FormField.isInvalid.description: Shows error message, hides helper text

components.name: Table / TableHeader / TableBody / TableRow / TableHead / TableCell
components.import: import { Table, TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableHead, TableCell } from '@arcana-ui/core'
components.description: Styled data table with striped rows, hover states, and sortable column headers.
components.when: Display tabular data: user lists, transaction history, analytics, settings

design.theme: Warm stone neutrals, deep indigo primary, amber accent
